scripts.pre-release: version=$(cat ../postgrest-dist/package.json | jq -r '.version') && postgrestVersion=$(echo $version | sed -e 's/-[0-9]*$//g') && jq '.version = "'$version'"' package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json && curl -LO https://github.com/PostgREST/postgrest/releases/download/$postgrestVersion/postgrest-$postgrestVersion-windows-x64.zip && unzip postgrest-*-windows-x64.zip && mv artifacts/postgrest-windows-x64/postgrest.exe ./postgrest.exe && rm -rf artifacts postgrest-*-windows-x64.zip
